author: SkinnyTaste
name: How To Make Parmesan Asparagus Fries

ingredients.notes: about 20, tough ends snapped off (look for thicker spears)
(or dairy-free Parmesan such as Follow Your Heart)

instructions: Combine breadcrumbs and Parmesan in a large shallow bowl. Place egg and flour in another shallow bowl and whisk well. Dip asparagus in the egg mixture, then the panko-parmesan and spray generously with olive oil. Place in air fryer basket in an even layer and air fry 380F 6 to 7 minutes, flipping halfway until golden and tender. To bake, preheat the oven to 425F. Spray a sheet pan with oil, and place breaded asparagus on the sheet pan.  Spray with oil and bake 12 to 14 minutes, turning halfway, until golden and tender.
